title: Update now
content:
There is a known bug in v2.64.0 that prevents you from changing the brush size.

Please update to the latest version to fix this issue.

Pixquare Team.

title: Update now!
content:
There is a known bug that crashes the app when pasting and using the Move tool on tilemaps.

Please update to the latest version to fix this issue.

Pixquare Team.
